news.title: Two US marines implicated in killing family in notorious Iraq war shooting, expert tells BBC
news.summary: New evidence raises doubts about the longest US war crimes investigation of the Iraq war and how US forces are held to account.

news.title: Keyless car theft devices used by criminals sell for Â£20k online
news.summary: It is not illegal currently to own the gadgets but the government has promised to ban them.

news.title: Mysterious drones have been spotted at night at airports across Europe. How worried should we be?
news.summary: Drones have been found across Western Europe near airports, military bases and power plants, as part of a suspected programme of 'hybrid warfare'

news.title: Premature birth can be incredibly lonely, says Beatrice
news.summary: The princess appeared on a podcast ahead of World Prematurity Day for premature birth research charity Borne.

news.title: Hackers steal maternity ward CCTV videos in India cybercrime racket
news.summary: Police say that dozens of videos of pregnant women undergoing medical check-ups were sold on the internet.

news.title: Three things you can do if your child's friends annoy you
news.summary: It's tempting to tell your child they can't hang out with a friend, but that often won't solve the problem.

news.title: How my on-air 'brain fog' moment sparked a big debate
news.summary: When the BBC's Zoe Kleinman spoke about going through perimenopause she got a huge response.

news.title: Formula 1 tech used to rev-up train wi-fi speeds in new pilot
news.summary: The 60 day pilot will use signals from mobile phone masts and satellites in space to create a more reliable connection.
